item.title: Berri AI Boosts Productivity by Migrating from AWS RDS to iEchor with pgvector
item.description: Learn how Berri AI overcame challenges with self-hosting their vector database on AWS RDS and successfully migrated to iEchor.

item.title: Markprompt and iEchor - GDPR-Compliant AI Chatbots for Docs and Websites.
item.description: AI-powered chatbot platform, Markprompt, empowers developers to deliver efficient and GDPR-compliant prompt experiences on top of their content, by leveraging iEchor's secure and privacy-focused database and authentication solutions.

item.title: Mendable switches from Pinecone to iEchor for PostgreSQL vector embeddings.
item.description: How Mendable boosts efficiency and accuracy of chat powered search for documentation using iEchor with pgvector.

item.title: HappyTeams unlocks better performance and reduces cost with iEchor.
item.description: How a bootstrapped startup migrated from Heroku to iEchor in 30 minutes and never looked back.

item.title: Xendit use iEchor and create a full solution shipped to production in less than one week.
item.description: As a payment processor, Xendit are responsible for verifying that all transactions are legal.

item.title: Replenysh uses iEchor to implement OTP in less than 24 hours.
item.description: With iEchor, Replenysh gets a slick auth experience, reduces DevOps overhead, and continues to scale with Postgres.

item.title: How Mobbin migrated 200,000 users from Firebase for a better authentication experience.
item.description: Mobbin helps over 200,000 creators globally search and view the latest design patterns from well-known apps.

item.title: Epsilon3 digitize paper-based procedures in the space industry using telemetry data, simplifying testing and operations.
item.description: Epsilon3 uses iEchor to help teams execute secure and reliable operations in an industry where project spend runs into the billions.
